item.description:
The Boston Red Sox will proudly host the 5th Annual Futures at Fenway minor league doubleheader on Saturday, July 10, at 12pm.

Minor league baseball's stars of tomorrow will once again be playing minor league games at Fenway Park. Game One will feature the Red Sox short season Single A affiliate Lowell Spinners taking on the Jamestown Jammers from the Florida organization. The second game will showcase the Single A Advanced Affilliate Salem Red Sox battling the Potomac Nationals of the Washington organization.

The afternoon of baseball will allow fans to enjoy moderate ticket prices, discounted concessions and a fun-filled family atmosphere including autograph sessions and on-field promotions.

Ticket prices start at $5.00. Single Admission ticket will be honored for both games.

Tickets are available to the general public on www.redsox.com on Saturday, February 13, at 10am.
item.name: 5th Annual Futures at Fenway Minor League Doubleheader
